overview: The one who is brave to face the challenges of life is better off than the one who chose to be defeated. As a writer for almost 5 years she has faced different challenges and junctures where she was confused of different things and almost given up her profession for the sake of material things. At the same time, with her experiences she learned to weigh things and choose what makes her happy and the good for all. And as a writer, she challenged herself to write more interesting and beneficial topics. Her latest topics are about <a href="http://www.lightingbylux.com/Kitchen-Lighting-s/13.htm"><b>Kitchen Lighting</b></a> from <a href="http://www.lightingbylux.com"><b>Lightingbylux.com</b></a>, a factor in producing well decorated homes.
